## Checklist (must be true before merge)
- [ ] Linked the GitHub Issue
- [ ] Changes are on a feature branch (not `main`)
- [ ] Code runs locally (basic smoke test)
- [ ] No secrets committed (`.env`, passwords, tokens)
- [ ] Reviewer is NOT the PR author (required)
